The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 03 September is 68,602 (7,906.8 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 29 August, there were 2,197 new confirmed cases (253.2 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 22 August, there were 2,750 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 20% (553 fewer cases).
